QuestData.Title: A Fighting Chance
QuestData.Description: Blessed be the Light! I need your help!$B$BOn my way into Hillsbrad I noticed several families of adorable little deer. As I went out to pet one of the little fawns a ravenous mountain cat leapt out and killed it. I fled to Tarren Mill and swore to solve the plight of the hill fawn. Now, after many days of tinkering, I have created the hill fawn's salvation!$B$BTake my wand into the fields to the west and use it to empower the wee hill fawns. Once empowered they will be able to fend for themselves!
QuestData.RewardText: WHAT!? No, don't tell me that, $n! It can't be true! My... I... I would never...$B$BI won't give up, $c. Just you wait and see. I will save those fawns!
